member.name: T:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeControllerAttribute
member.summary: Configure the Web API settings for this Breeze Controller
member.remarks: Clears all s and adds the Breeze formatter for JSON content. Removes the competing ASP.NET Web API's QueryFilterProvider if present. Adds for OData query processing Adds returning a Metadata action filter which (by default) converts a Metadata string response to an HTTP response with string content.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeControllerAttribute.Initialize(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpControllerSettings,System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpControllerDescriptor)
member.summary: Initialize the Breeze controller with a single for JSON and a single for Breeze OData support

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeControllerAttribute.GetQueryableFilterProvider(Breeze.WebApi2.EnableBreezeQueryAttribute)
member.summary: Return the IQueryable for a Breeze Controller
member.remarks: By default returns an . Override to substitute a custom provider.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeControllerAttribute.GetJsonFormatter
member.summary: Return the Breeze-specific that formats content to JSON. This formatter must be tailored to work with Breeze clients.
member.remarks: By default returns the Breeze . Override it to substitute a custom JSON formatter.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeControllerAttribute.GetMetadataFilterProvider(Breeze.WebApi2.MetadataToHttpResponseAttribute)
member.summary: Return the Metadata for a Breeze Controller
member.remarks: By default returns an . Override to substitute a custom provider.

member.name: P:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeControllerAttribute.MaxExpansionDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets max expansion depth at controller level

member.name: P:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeControllerAttribute.EnsureStableOrdering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether query composition should alter the original query when necessary to ensure a stable sort order.
member.value: A true value indicates the original query should be modified when necessary to guarantee a stable sort order. A false value indicates the sort order can be considered stable without modifying the query. Query providers that ensure a stable sort order should set this value to false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeControllerAttribute.HandleNullPropagation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating how null propagation should be handled during query composition.

member.name: P:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeControllerAttribute.MaxAnyAllExpressionDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum depth of the Any or All elements nested inside the query.
member.remarks: This limit helps prevent Denial of Service attacks. The default value is 1.
member.value: The maxiumum depth of the Any or All elements nested inside the query.

member.name: P:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeControllerAttribute.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of query results to send back to clients.
member.value: The maximum number of query results to send back to clients.

member.name: T:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeQueryableAttribute
member.summary: Extend Web API's for expected Breeze OData-like query support.

member.name: T:Breeze.WebApi2.EnableBreezeQueryAttribute
member.summary: Extend Web API's for expected Breeze OData-like query support.
member.remarks:
Remember to add it to the Filters for your configuration. Automatically added to each IQueryable method when you put the [BreezeController] attribute on an ApiController class.
See also http://blogs.msdn.com/b/webdev/archive/2014/03/13/getting-started-with-asp-net-web-api-2-2-for-odata-v4-0.aspx

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.EnableBreezeQueryAttribute.GetQueryHelper(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage)
member.summary: Get the QueryHelper instance for the current request. We use a single instance per request because QueryHelper is stateful, and may preserve state between the ApplyQuery and OnActionExecuted methods.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.EnableBreezeQueryAttribute.OnActionExecuted(System.Web.Http.Filters.HttpActionExecutedContext)
member.summary: Called when the action is executed. If the return type is IEnumerable or IQueryable, calls OnActionExecuted in the base class, which in turn calls ApplyQuery.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.EnableBreezeQueryAttribute.ApplyQuery(System.Linq.IQueryable,System.Web.Http.OData.Query.ODataQueryOptions)
member.summary: All standard OData web api support is handled here (except select and expand). This method also handles nested orderby statements the the current ASP.NET web api does not yet support. This method is called by base.OnActionExecuted

member.name: T:Breeze.WebApi2.MetadataToHttpResponseAttribute
member.summary: Converts output of a method named "Metadata" that returns a string into an HttpResponse with string content.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.MetadataToHttpResponseAttribute.OnActionExecuted(System.Web.Http.Filters.HttpActionExecutedContext)
member.summary: Called when the action is executed.

member.name: T:Breeze.WebApi2.BreezeJsonFormatterAttribute
member.summary: Establish a JsonFormatter configured for Breeze controllers
member.remarks: The Breeze JsonFormatter is the same Newtonsoft-based JsonFormatter shipped in the ASP.NET Web Api, configured specifically for Breeze controllers.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.QueryHelper.BeforeApplyQuery(System.Linq.IQueryable,System.Web.Http.OData.Query.ODataQueryOptions)
member.summary: Provide a hook to do any processing before applying the query. This implementation does nothing.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.QueryHelper.ApplyQuery(System.Linq.IQueryable,System.Web.Http.OData.Query.ODataQueryOptions,System.Web.Http.OData.Query.ODataQuerySettings)
member.summary: Apply the queryOptions to the query. This method handles nested order-by statements the the current ASP.NET web api does not yet support.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.QueryHelper.ApplySelect(System.Linq.IQueryable,System.Web.Http.OData.Query.ODataQueryOptions)
member.summary: Apply the select clause to the queryable

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.QueryHelper.ApplyExpand(System.Linq.IQueryable,System.Web.Http.OData.Query.ODataQueryOptions)
member.summary: Apply to expands clause to the queryable

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.QueryHelper.PostExecuteQuery(System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Perform any work after the query is executed. Does nothing in this implementation but is available to derived classes.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.QueryHelper.WrapResult(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage,System.Linq.IQueryable)
member.summary: Replaces the response.Content with the query results, wrapped in a QueryResult object if necessary.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.QueryHelper.ConfigureFormatter(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.Linq.IQueryable)
member.summary: Configure the JsonFormatter. Does nothing in this implementation but is available to derived classes.
member.param: Used to retrieve the current JsonFormatter

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.QueryHelper.ConfigureFormatter(System.Net.Http.Formatting.JsonMediaTypeFormatter,System.Linq.IQueryable)
member.summary: Configure the JsonFormatter. Does nothing in this implementation but is available to derived classes.

member.name: M:Breeze.WebApi2.QueryHelper.Close(System.Object)
member.summary: Release any resources associated with this QueryHelper.
member.param: Response payload, which may have associated resources.

member.name: T:Breeze.WebApi2.QueryResult
member.summary: Wrapper for results that have an InlineCount, to support paged result sets.
